name: Pipe Lines: Hexa
description:
Pipe Lines returns for Hexa Mania!
Do you enjoy the puzzle games? Do you like the lovely colors?
Here comes the perfect game for you! PIPE LINES : HEXA!

HOW TO PLAY
• Connect same colors with pipe!
• Fill the all honeycomb cells!
• Be careful! The pipes can be cut off by other pipe!
• Challenge 3 stars on all levels!

FEATURES
• Hundreds of levels!
• Daily Reward!
• Beautiful Game Arts!
• Musical Sound Effects!
• FREE updates!

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with iPhones, iPads and iPod Touches.

NOTES
• This app contains ads.
• This app contains In-app products.
